Rosa se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida con el crédito que recibe ya que le ha sido de gran apoyo para cumplir sus metas en un tiempo más corto. Con el nuevo préstamo comprará material para mejorar el corral donde mantiene a sus animales y un poco de alimento para los mismos.

Las demás integrantes del grupo son María Margarita quien invertirá en tienda de abarrotes, Catalina e Hilda invertirán en borregos, Alberta en caballos, Paulina y Leticia  en guajolotes, Juana en taxi, Ma Natalia en pollos y Rosaura en ropa.

*La fotografía fue tomada en las escaleras del kiosco del municipio, Rosa Elena es quien porta un sombrero.
texts.en:
Joyful and vibrant is what describes this Mexican community. Streams form in the fields and end in the river, they produce furrows in the land that are visible from the river banks. Beyond all of this, is a very tranquil community, the inhabitants do not hesitate to offer a greeting or smile to any visitor.

Rosa Elena is a capable, responsible, generous, but above all, dedicated woman. She strives together with her partner Samuel to give their four children a better opportunity to excel. In raising poultry, Rosa has found an efficient and practical way to protect the interests of her family without neglecting her home.

Rosa is very happy with and grateful for the loan she already received as it has been great at helping her to accomplish her goals sooner. With the new loan she will purchase material to improve the farmyard, where she keeps her animals, and a little feed for them.

The other group members are María Margarita who will invest in a grocery store, Catalina and Hilda who will invest in sheep, Alberta in horses, Paulina and Leticia in turkeys, Juana in a taxi, Ma Natalia in chicken, and Rosaura in clothing.

The photograph was taken on the steps of the town kiosk. Rosa Elena is the one wearing a hat.

loans.use: to purchase material to improve the farmyard and for feed.

location.town: La Cienega, San Felipe del progreso

loans.name: Caminemos Al Futuro  Ii Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal CAMINEMOS AL FUTURO II, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia María Antonieta sigue con su negocio de ferretería, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio  el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  a su negocio, la socia continua vendiendo clavos, cemento, bidones, pinturas entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de pinturas entre otros.
Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos.
Las socias que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo y salud.
texts.en:
María Antonieta belongs to the "Caminemos al Futuro II" communal bank, which is located in the province and department of Cusco.

She continues with her hardware business, which she has been running for a while now. Things are going well, thanks to her daily dedication to the business. She continues to sell nails, cement, barrels and paints amongst other things which her clients ask her for. She wishes to be able to continue working and thus carry on supporting her family.

She is asking for the loan to purchase paints amongst other things.

All of the members are grateful for the opportunity given to them and they promise to comply with the repayment schedule in the set time.

The members in the attached photo asked permission to arrive late to the meeting for work and health reasons.

loans.use: to buy paintings and other items.

loans.name: Edilberto

texts.es:
Edilberto tiene 54 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Lagunas, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Edilberto se dedica a la crianza de ganado lechero, venta de alfalfa, y su esposa se dedica a la venta de leche de sus propias vacas ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de los mismos y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Edilberto is 54 years old, he lives together with his wife and children in Lagunas district, a community which earns a living from agriculture, business and livestock. It is located in Chiclayo province which belongs to the Lambayeque region, north coast of Peru. 

Edilberto earns a living from raising cattle for milking, and selling alfalfa . His wife earns a living selling milk from her own cows. He is asking for a loan from Edpyme Alternativa to purchase balanced feed to fatten the cows and thus generate more income for his family to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase balanced feed for his cattle

loans.name: Billy

texts.en:
Billy is 60 years old and married with seven children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Billy is borrowing 6,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Billy has been raising pigs for one year and also earns additional income from running a general store. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Invertir en surtido de pulseras, ganchos, perfumes, colonias y esmaltes

loans.name: Elvira

texts.es: La señora Elvira tiene 26 años de edad vive actualmente en domicilio propio tiene su esposo que tienen un hijo que depende de ellos el cual se encuentra estudiando en el nivel primario, vive en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio de Monteagudo y trabaja en la misma ciudad. Su principal actividad de la señora es la producción y venta de pan, trabaja arduamente en su actividad de lunes a sábado para cubrir los gastos de alimentación, ropa, servicios básicos y otros gastos que incurren en su hogar. Es por eso que requiere un préstamo que será destinado para la compra  de un horno a gas de 6 latas y compra de insumos para la elaboración de pan, para ampliar su negocio, con la compra de la misma la señora aumentará su actividad de producción y venta de pan por lo tanto podrá aumentar de manera eficiente y obtener mayores ingresos y mejorar sus condiciones de vida en su hogar con su hijo y su esposo.
texts.en:
Elvira is 26 years old and currently lives in her own with her partner and his son who depends on them. He is studying at primary school at the moment. Elvira lives in Chuquisaca department, municipality of Monteagudo and works in the same city. 

Her main activity is making and selling bread, she works hard at this from monday to saturday to cover the costs of food, clothing, basic services and other expenses of the home.  

She requires a loan which will be used to buy a gas oven with 6 hobs, and to purchase supplies to make bread in order to grow her business. With the purchase of this she will increase her productivity and bread sales which will make her more efficient and she will obtain more income and improve the living conditions in her home for her and her family.

loans.use: Compra  de un horno a gas para ampliar su negocio y mejorar los niveles de venta de esa manera tener ingresos para su familia

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is 60 years old and married with three children. She is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Visitacion has requested a 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Visitacion has been in this business for two years now and has borrowed twice in the past from NWTF to sustain it. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 40 years old and married with three children who she works very hard to provide for.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy items for her store like canned goods, condiments, home care products and other groceries.

Roselyn has been in this business for one year. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items for her store like canned goods, condiments, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in all sorts of seafood, and primary products which she needs to meet the demand of her clients

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in fish, crabs, shrimp, shells, plastic bags, paper, etc. and, so, to increase her sales and also her earnings.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 27 years old, married and has a ready-to-wear clothing business in the Philippines. She has requested a 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy clothes such as shorts, pants, dresses and t-shirts to sell at her local market.

Rowena has been in this business for four years. She would like to save money to expand it in the future.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell at her local market.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina de 44 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres pequeños hijos de 11 años, 4 años y 2 años de edad a los que con mucho sacrificio los están sacando adelante en sus estudios para que sean grandes personas en la vida. Cristina es una mujer muy emprendedora que siempre sale adelante, ella posee una pequeña tienda de productos básicos de primera necesidad desde hace diez años donde vende productos como: pan dulce, huevos, verduras, lácteos entre otros  además para  tener mejores ingresos económicos hace prendas de vestir a personas que la solicitan. Cristina solicito un crédito el cual invirtió en mejorar con nuevos productos su pequeña tienda y gracias a la buena experiencia anterior solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI para continuar en la inversión de su tienda ya que cada día son más las personas que visitan su negocio en busca de nuevos y variados productos, por lo anterior ella va invertir en: maíz, arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, golosinas, leche, café, champú, pan dulce, huevos etc. todo en mayor cantidad para poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en: Cristina, 44 years old, lives in a house she owns with her life partner and their three young children, ages 11, 4, and 2, who, with a lot of sacrifice, they are getting ahead in their education to be great people in life. Cristina is a very enterprising woman who always gets ahead. She has had a small store of basic products for the past ten years, where she sells products such as sweet breads, eggs, vegetables, dairy products, and more. In addition, to have more income, she sews clothing for people who ask for them. Cristina asked for a loan which she invested in improving her small store with new products and, thanks to the good experience of the previous loan, she asks FUSAI for another loan to continue with the investment in her store since each day more people come to her business looking for new and varied products. For this reason, she will invest in corn, rice, beans, sugar, oil, sweets, milk, coffee, shampoo, sweet breads, eggs, etc. all in a greater quantity to be able to meet her customers' demand.

loans.use: to invest in corn, rice, beans, sugar, oil, sweets, milk, coffee, shampoo, sweet breads, eggs, etc., all in a greater quantity for her business.

loans.name: Espelita

texts.en:
Espelita is 44 years old and married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family, running a general store in the Philippines. Espelita has requested a 17,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, other drinks and coffee.

Espelita has borrowed and paid back nine loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 14 years and also earns an income from food vending. She aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her store

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth de 58 años de edad es madre soltera y habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su nieta de 15 años de edad. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que se preocupa por tener el sustento del hogar y que no le falte nada,  ella se gana la vida vendiendo  frutas y verduras y además buscando la manera de obtener mejores ingresos se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos como yuca, pastelitos de verdura con carne y otros por la tarde, ya tiene 20 años de dedicarse en sus negocios por lo que posee mucha experiencia y es bien reconocida. Rosa solicito un crédito el cual invirtió en: compra de fruta y verduras y así ha logrado mantener a flote su negocio, es por ello que con el deseo de incrementar su mercadería  surtirlo más solicita un nuevo crédito a FUSAI que le permita invertir en: frutas por temporadas, ingredientes para antojitos típicos y así tener mejores condiciones de vida. Por lo anterior con el monto solicitado ella piensa comprar: tomates, papas, cebollas, pepino, sandia, melón, naranja, repollos, maíz, güisquil, maíz, aceite para cocina, etc.
texts.en: Elizabeth, 58, is a single mother and lives in a house she owns with her 15-year-old granddaughter. She is a very hard-working woman who concerns herself with having the sustenance in her household and that they don't lack anything. She earns her living selling fruits and vegetables and seeking the means to get better income, she sells traditional snacks such as yucca, vegetable pies with meat and more in the afternoons. She has been working in her businesses for 20 years now, so she has a lot of experience and is well known. Rosa asked for a loan which she invested in the purchase of fruits and vegetables and, so, she has managed to keep her business afloat. For this, with the desire to increase her merchandise and stock it more, she asks FUSAI for another loan which will allow her to invest in seasonal fruits, and ingredients for traditional snacks and, so, to have better living conditions. For this reason, with the requested amount, she plans to purchase tomatoes, potatoes, onions, cucumbers, watermelons, melons, oranges, cabbages, corn, squash, cooking oil, etc.

loans.use: to invest in tomatoes, potatoes, onions, cucumbers, watermelons, melons, oranges, cabbages, corn, squash, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Gladis Johana

texts.es: Su pasión por la culinaria y la buena herencia que le dejo su madre quien estuvo dedicada durante años en su Restaurante, permitieron que hoy en día Gladis de 32 años, sea una exitosa microempresaria que diariamente atiende en su Restaurante con exquisitos platos típicos de la Región Caribe a sus fieles comensales, que la prefieren por su sazón, calidad y entusiasmo.  Cuenta con un año de funcionamiento en su local, sin embargo su éxito ha sido tal, que su clientela se ha incrementado y no cuenta con los recursos suficientes para abastecer la demanda de 30 platos adicionales a su producción.  Para satisfacer la demanda en su totalidad, está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará una estufa industrial y víveres como arroz, carnes, aceite y verduras.  Con esta inversión, ella considera que sus ventas se incrementarán y con ello se acercará más a su meta de tener su propio local y ofrecerles un mejor bienestar a sus hijos menores de edad, quienes tiene completamente a su cargo por ser madre soltera.
texts.en: Her passion for cooking and the good inheritance left to her by her mother, who worked for years in her restaurant, allowed Gladis, 32, to be a successful micro-entrepreneur today. She works in her restaurant daily with exquisite traditional dishes from the Caribbean region for her loyal diners. However, her success has been such that her customer base has increased and she doesn't have sufficient resources to meet the demand of 30 additional dishes to her production. To satisfy the entire demand, she is applying for her first Kiva loan through the intermediary of Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will purchase an industrial stove and groceries such as rice, meat, oils, and vegetables. With this investment, she expects that her sales will increase and, with that, she will get closer to her goal of having her own retail space and offer her minor children, who she has completely in her care as a single mother, a better well-being.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial stove and groceries such as rice, meat, oil, and vegetables.

loans.name: Esmeralda

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Esmeralda works hard to support her family. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from pig fattening. Esmeralda is borrowing 13,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Esmeralda has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Amanda Rosario

texts.es: LA SEÑORA AMANDA ROSARIO, es una persona de 31 años de edad, de estado civil soltera pero vive en concubinato con el señor Jhasmany, alcanzo a estudiar el bachillerato en humanidades, cuenta con dos dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus pequeños hijos y actualmente junto a su familia vive en su propia casa que se halla situado en la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora Amanda junto a su esposo cuentan con actividades económicas diversificadas siendo una de las principales la venta de chicharrón y la producción de leche cruda de ganado bovino; asimismo manifestar que el esposo de la clienta se dedica a prestar servicios de transporte urbano (taxi) con su propia vagoneta, el trabajo lo realiza durante 5 días de la semana lo que le permite generar ingresos económicos adicionales y finalmente la actividad económica que ambos esposos desarrollan los fines de semana (domingos) es la venta de chicharrón de cerdo en su propio domicilio, cada domingo compran dos cerdos de los cuales en promedio venden 60 platos que les permite generar ingresos adicionales para el sustento de su familia. Finalmente mencionar que la señora Amanda manifiesta ser una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere seguir mejorando su actividad económica de producción de leche cruda y para ello solicita el presente préstamo para poder realizar la compra de cascara de soya para la alimentación de sus ganados y de esta manera incrementar su producción de leche que le permitirá generar mayores ingresos económicos que van ha mejorar la condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Amanda Rosario is 31 years old, single, and lives in a domestic partnership with Jhasmany. She studied up to high school in Humanities. She has two dependents: her small children. Currently, she lives with her family in her own house located in the city of Cochabamba. Together with her husband, Amanda has many diverse jobs: a main one being the sale of "chicharron" (seasoned pork rind) and the production of raw milk from cattle. Also, she comments that her husband works rendering urban transportation services (taxi) with his own car. He works 5 days a week, which allows him to generate additional income. Finally, the job that both partners do on weekends (Sundays) is to sell "chicharron" in their own home. Every Sunday they buy two pigs, from where they sell an average of 60 dishes, which allow them to generate extra income to support their family. Finally, it is good to mention that Amanda is a hardworking and responsible person who wants to continue improving her job of producing raw milk. For this, she is requesting the current loan to buy soybean hulls to feed her cattle, and in this way increase their milk production. This will allow her to generate more income that will improve the living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy soybean hulls to feed her cattle and improve their milk production, which will improve her family's level of income.

loans.name: Leidis De Jesús

texts.es: Leidis de 25 años, reside en compañía de su cónyuge e hijos en un barrio del municipio de Cartagena y cuenta con cuatro años de comercializar por medio de catálogos especializados, productos de belleza y aseo personal.  Esta idea de negoció, inició tras asociarse con una vecina quien le proporcionó la información sobre las oportunidades de esta modalidad comercial y al considerar que podría trabajar desde su casa, sin descuidar a su familia, no dudó ni un instante en incorporarse.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar productos de belleza y aseo personal que le han encargado sus clientes.  Ella considera que con esta inversión podrá aprovechar promociones que le permitirán manejar un margen superior al que habitualmente gana. Su meta a futuro es ser líder de revista y comprar una casa propia.
texts.en: Leidis, 25, lives with her spouse and children in a neighborhood in the municipality of Cartagena and has been selling from specialized catalogs of beauty and personal care products for four years. This business idea she began through a neighbor who gave her the information about the opportunities of this type of sales and when she thought about being able to work from home without neglecting her family, she didn't hesitate even a moment to get involved. Currently, she is applying for her first Kiva loan, through the intermediary of Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to purchase beauty and personal care products which her customers have ordered. She expects that with this investment, she will be able to take advantage of promotions that will allow her to have a better margin than she usually gets. Her goal for the future is to be a catalog leader and to have her own house.

loans.use: to purchase beauty and personal care products that have been ordered by her customers.

loans.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto tiene 41 años de edad, es soltero, vive con su madre en el distrito de Pomahuaca, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. En dicho distrito sus actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, es un distrito mediano con aspiraciones a superarse.

Gilberto se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos de arroz de variedad capirona, cuenta con más de 15 años de experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para la compra de abono y fertilizantes para el adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de arroz, con esto Gilberto espera mejorar su producción ofreciendo un producto de mayor calidad a sus clientes, lo que le permitirá obtener mayores ingresos mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Gilberto is 41 years old and single. He lives with his mother in the Pomahuaca district of the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru. The main business activities in this district are agriculture, commerce, and livestock. It is a medium-sized district with aspirations for improvement.

He is a farmer and he cultivates rice of the capirona variety. He has over 15 years of experience in this work, with very good personal and work references in the area.

The loan will be used to buy compost and fertilizers to adequately maintain his rice crop. With this, Gilberto hopes to improve his production and offer a better quality product to his customers. This will allow him to get greater earnings, improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers to adequately maintain his rice crop.

loans.name: Thin's Group

texts.en:
Thin, who is a 45-year-old farmer living in the Kam Rieng district of Battambang province, is a married mother of two dependent children. She struggles for a living by way of rice growing. She also raises pigs for sale and works as a paid worker for fees. She has been involved in her job for 14 years. To support her family's conditions, she can earn income of about 67,000 Cambodia riels (KHR) per day.

A lack of pig feed and not having enough working capital to buy it are the main challenges that Thin faces these days. This is Thin’s second loan cycle with VisionFund (a Kiva partner) and she has repaid her previous loan completely. The previous loan helped her to have a better house to stay than before. In a group of three, she is the leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, pesticide, and pig feed for supporting her businesses. She hopes to earn more income to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide, and pig feed for supporting her businesses.

loans.name: Jai Vadjai Mata Mbg-B Group

texts.en:
Raising birds gives many people a great opportunity in life to develop a business. This is the case with Chhaya Kailas, age 34, who has a small business raising laying hens and chickens which she feeds to fatten and later sell. Chhaya Kailas lives in the small village of Maharashtra, India where she shares her life with her two children. She is a divorcee and raises her children single handedly. They are a humble family, but are hardworking and sincere.

Chayya Kailas, along with her group member, is requesting a loan amount of 30,000 India rupees (INR). She will use her portion of the loan amount to buy hens, chickens, and chicken feed. In this way, she can increase her production and have more working capital so that she can provide her family with greater financial stability.

loans.use: to buy hens, chickens, and chicken feed.

loans.name: Immaculee

texts.en:
Immaculee is 32 years old and is married with three children between the ages of 10 months and 9 years old.

She owns a business selling various goods such as lotions, soap, biscuits, etc. She has eight years of experience in this business, and she works from 6 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day except Saturday.

Immaculee has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods such as lotions, soap, biscuits, etc. to resell. With any profits, she will be able to save for her future, reinvest in her business and pay her children's school fees.

Immaculee is a repeat Kiva borrower. Her first loan was in 2012 and resulted in increased offerings in her boutique. With those profits, she was able to expand her business and afford various household expenses, which have contributed to a lifestyle improvement for herself and her family. She is very grateful to VFC and Kiva for allowing her to grow her business and achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as lotions, soap, biscuits, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Titus

texts.en:
Titus is a married man with one child. He describes himself to be honest.

Titus operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. His business is located in an urban area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the rainy season, which affects his business.

He will use the loan of 50,000 Kenya shillings (KES) to service and maintain his motorcycle. His business goal is to have a fleet of motorcycles within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a good life. This is his fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank.

loans.use: to service and maintain his motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more sorghum, maize, and potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is a single woman. She describes herself as very social.

She operates a retail business where she knits sweaters. She has been involved in this business for 12 years. Her business is located in a residential area and her primary customers are locals.

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of threads and other materials for making sweaters. Her business goal is to have a good knitting machine within five years. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of threads and other materials for making sweaters.

loans.name: Pollson

texts.en:
Pollson is 31 years old. He has three children to support.

He has been a farmer for the last four years. He has been earning an income of KES 10,000 per month. This is his first loan of KES 25,000 from Vision Fund Kenya to buy seeds and fertilizers for planting in order to have high harvest.

He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay his loan and the surplus to buy a dairy cow for milk production. His hopes and dreams are to kick out poverty.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for planting in order to have a high harvest.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself as focused.

She operates a retail business where she sells sugar, flour, soap, bread, milk and other items. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge as insufficient capital.

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of sugar, flour, soap, milk and other items. She hopes that in the future, she will own land. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, flour, soap, milk and other items.

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is a married woman with 5 children. She describes herself to be humble. She operates a retail business where she sells firewood. She has been involved in this business for 5 years. 

Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital. She will use the KES 60,000 loan to buy more stock of firewood to resell.

Her business goal is to be successful within 5 years. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Her previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of firewood.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a married man with 6 children. He describes himself to be honest. He operates a retail business where he sells cattle. He has been involved in this business for 4 years. 

His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital. He will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more cattle. 

This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more cattle to resell.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a married woman. She has one child. She describes herself as honest.

She operates a retail business where she sells charcoal. She has been involved in this business for three years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge as insufficient capital.

She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of charcoal. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy more stock of charcoal.

loans.name: Abishyizehamwe Group

texts.en:
Thacienne is a 48-year-old married mother of 4. She is the leader of the Abishyizehamwe Group. She is the one who is holding a paper in her hand. There are 12 female members in the group, all from the same community, but only 11 are pictured as one member was unable to attend due to a sick child. All members of the group are requesting funds to expand their business with the hopes of supporting their children and family.  

Thacienne sells beans at the market. She works hard to support her family and provide them with a better life. Every morning Thacienne opens her stand at 7am and works tirelessly until her daily supply is sold. 

Because beans are a staple food in the Rwandan diet, Thacienne foresees an unwavering demand, which she hopes will allow her to expand her business as she acquires more funds. 

She is requesting a loan from Kiva, via Vision Finance Company, to buy larger quantities of beans to sell to her community. With her profits, she will be able to get medical insurance for her family and pay the school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy beans to sell to the community.

loans.name: Jose Jesus

texts.es:
José Jesús tiene 55 años de edad, vive al lado de su conyuge tiene dos hijos en su poder, residen en el Caserío San Juan Pampa , una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

La actividad que realiza José Jesús es la cría y comercialización de ganado vacuno, posee reses de su propiedad, adicionalmente se dedica a la agricultura cultivo de papa y maiz, contando con parcela sembrada de papa media has, su ganado vacuno lo cría en sus invernas tiene 20 años de experiencia en el rubro, ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de ganado vacuno y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Jesús is 55 years old, lives with his spouse and has two children in his care. They live in the village of San Juan Pampa, a rural zone of Santo Tomás district, located in Cutervo province, which belongs to Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

The work that José Jesús does is raising and selling cattle. He has his own cattle and additionally he works in agriculture growing potatoes and corn, having a plot of a half hectare of potatoes planted. He raises his cattle in the winter. He has 20 years of experience in the field, he has asked for a loan to purchase cattle and in this way generate more income for his family and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Grupo Las Cruces La Torre Group

texts.es:
Matilde es una mujer de 52 años de edad, tiene una linda familia de seis hijos de las edades entre 12 y 30 años esta querida familia vive en una comunidad denominada Suchitepéquez.
Matilde (la primera del lado izquierdo de blusa celeste con un delantal) es una mujer que trabaja día a día para poder obtener ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, la actividad que ella realiza es la compra y venta de frutas con el que tiene ya cuatro años de realizarlo, gracias a esta humilde labor ha logrado la prosperidad de su familia. Matilde con el afán de seguir mejorando la calidad de su negocio ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo para seguir invirtiendo  en su negocio de frutas y así satisfacer mejor las necesidades  de los clientes.
El gran sueño de Matilde es poder Contar con un local donde pueda vender mejor sus frutas, y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Matilde, 52, has a beautiful family of six children aged from 12 to 30. This beloved family lives in the community of Suchitepéquez.

Matilde (the first one from the left, wearing a light blue top and an apron) works every day to earn income and help her husband with the household expenses. She buys and sells fruit, and has been doing this for four years now. Through this humble work, she has achieved prosperity for her family.

Eager to make quality improvements, Matilde is applying for a loan to continue investing in her business of fruit sales and better serve her clients' needs. Her greatest dream is to have stall where she can better conduct her sales and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy and sell fruit.

loans.name: Mujeres Chuisanto Group

texts.es:
Maria es una madre de familia, muy trabajadora, dedicada y muy perseverante tiene 35 años de edad, con una linda familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 2 y 6 años ellos viven en una comunidad denominada Suchitepéquez.
Maria (la tercera de izquierda a derecha de blusa Café) es una mujer muy emprendedora y desde hace un año decidió elegir una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, la labor que ella escogió fue ser costurera elabora ropa típica, dándole los últimos toques para su respectivo uso, gracias a su calidad de servicio mucha gente lo visita, y su entusiasmo por superarse la tiene ahora como líder del grupo Chuisanto que juntas con sus compañeras solicitan un préstamo que invertirá en la compra de telas para blusas, cortes entre otros.
El gran sueño de Maria es poder hacer crecer su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is a mother, very hard-working and very persistent. She is 35 years old, with a lovely family of two children between the ages of 2 and 6. They live in a community called Suchitepéquez.

Maria (the third from the left in a brown blouse) is a very enterprising woman who, a year ago, decided to choose an activity which would generate income for her to be able to support her husband with the household expenses. The work she chose was to be a seamstress. She makes traditional clothing, giving the final touches for their use. Thanks to her quality of service, many people come to her. Her enthusiasm to improve herself now has her as the leader of the Chuisanto group in which she, along with her partners, asks for a loan which she will invest in the purchase of fabric for blouses, traditional skirts, and more.

Maria's great dream is to be able to grow her business to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase fabric to make traditional skirts and blouses.

loans.name: Estefania

texts.es:
La señora Estefanía, tiene 43 años de edad, vive con el señor Florentino mismos que tienen cuatro hijos dependientes de sus ingresos, vive en una comunidad rural muy alejada al área urbano, sus hijos estudian en las unidades educativas del municipio ya que en la comunidad donde viven no cuentan con los establecimientos requeridos y como madre quiere lo mejor para sus hijos. 
La señora Estefanía, se dedica a la agricultura porque es lo único que aprendió con sus progenitores.
El año 2014 sufrió una disminución en sus ingresos económicos por los bajos precios que atravesó los productos agrícolas y también por las lluvias que le echaron a perder sus cosechas de la papa, la comunidad entera sufrió los daños.
Por estos motivos mencionados su estabilidad económica ha sufrido un desequilibrio, afectando directamente en la adquisición de sus insumos agrícolas que se requieren para la producción y para la alimentación de sus hijos. La señora Estefanía, es una persona humilde y muy respetuosa en su comunidad donde trabaja, por lo dedicado al trabajo agrícola, con lo cual saca a su familia adelante para así mantener y cubrir los gastos de estudios de sus hijos.
La señora Estefanía, está solicitando el crédito para comprar semilla de papa de esta manera mejorar su economía y calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Estefanía is 43 years old, lives with Florentino and they have four children dependent on their income. She lives in a rural community very distant from the urban area. Her children are students at the municipal schools since in their community they don't have the necessary establishments and, as a mother, she wants the best for her children.

Estefanía works in agriculture because it is the only work she learned from her parents.

In 2014, she suffered a reduction in her income due to the low prices that the agricultural products brought in and also because of the rains that ruined her potato harvests. The entire community suffered the damages.

For the mentioned reasons, her economic stability suffered an imbalance, directly affecting the purchase of agricultural supplies that are needed for production and to feed her children. Estefanía is a humble person and very respected in the community where she works for how dedicated she is to agricultural work, with which she gets her family ahead to support and cover her children's educational expenses. Estefanía is asking for the loan to purchase potato seeds and in this way to improve her economic situation and quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds to improve her production and her family's quality of life.

loans.name: Amigas Compartiendo Exitos Group

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa tiene 55 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos que ya son mayores de edad. Es la tesorera  de la alcancía comunal “Amigas Compartiendo Exitos” formada hace más de 2 años por 5 personas decididas a triunfar y cumplir con sus metas planteadas. Tiene como negocio la venta de prendas de vestir como pulseras y demás accesorios hace un buen tiempo que ella misma realiza en casa, adicional a ello también vende productos de belleza. El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar los materiales al por mayor como hilos para realizar sus pulseras y perfumes, maquillajes, etc para luego venderlos. Su plan a futuro es continuar trabajando arduamente para comprar un puesto de ventas donde pueda ofrecer sus productos que realiza con mucha dedicación. En la foto del grupo Rosa se encuentra de pie en medio de las demás señoras sentadas.
texts.en: Rosa is 55 years old. She is married and has four children who are older in age. Rosa is the treasurer of the communal bank "Friends Sharing Successes" which was established more than two years ago by five people who were determined to triumph and meet their chosen goals. She has a business selling clothing accessories, such as bracelets, and other accessories that she has made herself in her home for quite some time. In addition, she also sells beauty products. This loan will be used to purchase in bulk the materials that she uses to make her bracelets, such as thread, and perfumes, makeups, etc. to later sell. Her plan for the future is to continue working hard to purchase a place to where she can sell and offer her products which she does with a lot of dedication. Rosa can be found in the group photo standing in the middle of the other women who are sitting.

loans.use: to purchase threads and beauty products.

loans.name: Job

texts.pt:
O Senhor Job é solteiro, vivendo na casa dos pais com seus irmãos e sobrinhos, ele é polícia e possui um barco de pesca no qual nos momentos livres faz o trabalho de pesca.
 Com o presente empréstimo ele vai adiquirir redes de pesca, cordas e anzois para reforçar o seu trabalho.
O seu maior sonho é ter a sua propria casa e construir a sua própria família. Tem tido dificuldades para se deslocar ao local de trabalho visto que este se encontra distante da sua residência e não possui meios próprios; devido a natureza do seu trabalho torna se difícil continuar com os estudos pois está a trabalhar em turnos.
texts.en:
Job is single. He lives at home with his parents, siblings and nephews. He is a police officer and he owns a fishing boat where he works on his free time.
With this loan he will buy fishing nets, rope and fish hooks to do the job.
His biggest dream is to own a home an have a family of his own. It is hard for him to get to work because the boat is far from where he lives and he doesn't have transportation of his own. Due to the nature of his job, it has been hard for him to continue studying as he works in shifts.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, rope and fish hooks for his work

loans.name: Jesus Sergio

texts.es:
Jesus Sergio tiene 52 años de edad, conviviente, sin hijos a su cargo , vive en casa familiar; en el distrito de Oyotún, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, Costa norte de Perú.

Jesus Sergio se dedica a brindar servicio de jornalería; hace 20 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, con buenas referencias laborales y personales, solicita préstamo para invertir en activo fijo; compra de una mochila para fumigar; esto le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus herramientas y darle una mejor apariencia, para poder brindar mejores servicios.
texts.en:
Jesus Sergio is 52 years old, partnered, without children in his care. He lives in the family house in the district of Oyotún, located in Chiclayo province, on the northern coast of Peru.

Jesus Sergio has worked as a daily laborer for 20 years. The business is located in his home. He has good work and personal references. He asks for a loan to invest in fixed assets. He will purchase a backpack fumigator, this will serve him to have his tools in better condition and give him a better appearance to be able to offer better services.

loans.use: to purchase a backpack fumigator.

loans.name: Soraya

texts.es:
Soraya continúa estudiando y trabajando. El crédito anterior lo invirtió en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera. El pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque no tuvo problemas en su trabajo. Actualmente ella se encuentra en la etapa final de su carrera y necesita dinero para el pago de sus mensualidades por adelantado e inicio de su tesis de grado. Su carácter es sensible, dispuesta a trabajar al servicio de sus semejantes, para educar a niñas y niños hasta los 7 años en su crecimiento, conduciéndolos a un aprendizaje, tomando en cuenta sus intereses y necesidades y las de su entorno familiar y social, “estudio psicología estoy en 4 año y me ocupo de administrar 2 departamentos con los que pago mis estudios…” comenta. La ventaja de sus actividades es que los horarios no se cruzan entre sí, la desventaja es la falta de capital para pagar las cuotas por adelantado y así obtener un descuento. Su sueño es desempeñar su profesión en educación parvulario, ella desea realizar el pago de las cuotas de sus estudios e inicio de trámites de tesis de grado. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 4 años que estudia.
Es por esos motivos que Soraya solicita un préstamo para el pago de las cuotas de sus estudios e inicio de trámites de tesis de grado.
texts.en: Soraya continues to study and work. The previous loan was invested in the payment of tuition for her program. Her payments were punctual because she didn't have any problem with her work. Currently, she is in the final stage of her program and needs money to pay her tuition in advance and begin her thesis. Her character is sensitive, ready to work to help her peers, to educate children up to age 7 in their development, guiding them in their learning, taking into account their interests and needs and those of their family and social environment. "I study psychology and am in my 4th year and I am in charge of running 2 departments with which I pay for my education..." she says. The advantage of her work is that the hours don't conflict and the disadvantage is the lack of capital to pay the tuition in advance and, so, to get a discount. Her dream is to work in her profession in preschool. She wants to pay the tuition for her education and begin the paperwork for her thesis. This is her 2nd loan cycle to pay for the tuition for her education and begin the paperwork for her thesis.

loans.use: to pay her tuition and begin with the paperwork for her thesis.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of apparel clothing to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es: El señora Ubaldina y su esposo viven en Cochabamba provincia chapare;  tienen 32 y 46  años de edad, convivientes más de 13 años, económicamente son independientes, La señora Ubaldina se dedica a la actividad de comercio de ropa vende ropa de todo tipo de niños y mayores vende por menor en su puesto que tiene en la ciudad de Cochabamba. La señora Ubaldina requiere el préstamo para la compra de mercadería de ropa para comercio ya que su ahorro lo invirtieron en la compra de terreno u lote de terreno.                                                                                                                                                                Por último, la señora Ubaldina y su esposo. Se sintieron muy esperanzados de acceder al préstamo, además de poder contar  con la compra de prendas de vestir para su negocio podrá tener mejores ingresos e incrementará su patrimonio familiar y de esa manera podrán mejorar su nivel de vida en beneficio de su familia hacia futuro.
texts.en:
Ubaldina and her husband live in Cochabamba, in Chapare province. They are 32 and 46 years old, living together for more than 13 years. Economically, they are independent. Ubaldina works selling clothing. She sells all sorts of clothing, buying wholesale and selling in her retail space that she has in the city of Cochabamba. Ubaldina needs the loan to purchase clothing merchandise to sell since she will invest her savings in the purchase of land or a plot of land.

Finally, Ubaldina and her husband are very hopeful to get the loan, in addition to being able to count on the purchase of clothing so her business will be able to have better income and increase their family legacy and in this way be able to improve their standard of living to benefit their family into the future.

loans.use: to purchase clothing merchandise to sell to expand her sales and generate better income for her family.

loans.name: Penina

texts.en: Penina is 56 years old. She is married with 8 children aged between 13 and 35 years, of whom 5  go to school. She is an artist and has been working in her business for 25 years. With the loan requested, she would like to buy more clothes and flowers for decorations. The profits from the business will be used to increase her savings and pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and flowers for decoration

loans.name: Sebastiao

texts.pt:
O Senhor Sebastião vive na casa dos pais com o irmão. É guarda, negóciante e serralheiro. Com o presente empréstimo vai adiquirir uma máquina de soldar, rebarbadeira, berbequim para aumentar os seus serviços de serralharia. 
Tem como sonho ter casa propria e casar.
A sua maior dificuldade é financeira.
texts.en:
Sebastião lives at home with his parents and his brother. He is a security guard, a businessman and a locksmith. With this loan he will buy a welding machine, a sander and a drill to increase his services as a locksmith.
His dream is to get married and have a house. His biggest challenge is his financial situation.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine, a sander and a drill to increase his services as a locksmith.

loans.name: Miguelina

texts.es: La señora Miguelina y su esposo, viven en Cochabamba provincia chapare; son convivientes más de 20 años, económicamente son independientes, ambos se dedican a la actividad de agricultura siembran papa y haba en vaina verde. En una superficie de 2 hectáreas. para la venta de sus productos cuenta con un mercado consolidado la feria semanal de Colomi, La señora Miguelina requiere el préstamo para la compra de 1 cabeza de ganado vacuno yunta, compra de semilla de papa y productos agroquímicos, ya que sus ahorros lo invirtieron en la construcción de vivienda.                                                                                                                                                                       Por último, la señora Miguelina  y su esposo se sintieron con la esperanza de accader al préstamo además de poder contar la ayuda porque con la compra de 1 cabeza de ganado vacuno yunta, semilla de papa y productos agroquímicos van tener mejores ingresos y incrementará su patrimonio familiar y de esa manera podrá mejorar su nivel de vida en beneficio de su familia hacia futuro.
texts.en:
Miguelina and her husband live in Cochabamba in Chapare province. They have been together for more than 20 years and are economically independent. They both work in agriculture, planting potatoes and green beans in an area of 2 hectares. To sell their products, they have an established market at the weekly fair in Colomi. Miguelina needs the loan to purchase a pair of cows, she will purchase potato seeds and agrochemicals and will invest her savings in the construction of their house.

Finally, Miguelina and her husband are hopeful to get the loan in addition to being able to count on the help because with the purchase of one pair of cows, potato seeds and agrochemical products, they will have more income and will increase their family legacy and, in this way, be able to improve their standard of living for the benefit of their family into the future.

loans.use: to purchase a team of cattle and potato seeds, and agrochemical products to improve her production and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in soft drinks, potatoes, eggs, milk, yogurt and juices.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.pt:
Senhora Catarina tem 48 anos de idade, casada e mãe de 4 filhos todos independentes, é negociante, vive em casa própria sustenta dois netos.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de chapas, areia, cimento, pedra para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa.
No futuro pretende terminar a construção da sua segunda casa e arrendar como forma de aumentar a renda familiar.
O seu desafio é de liquidar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora para garantir futuros financiamentos.
texts.en:
Catarina is 48 years old. She is married with 4 children, all independent. She is a businesswoman and she lives in a house that she owns with two grandchildren. 
She will use this loan to buy metal sheets, sand, cement, stone to continue building her home. In the future, she would like to finish building a second home to rent and increase her household income.
Her goal is to repay this loan on time, so she can make sure she has access to future ones.

loans.use: to buy metal sheets, sand, cement, stone to continue building her home

loans.name: Gary Edson

texts.es: El señor Gary, es una persona con una edad de 27 años, vive en el departamento de Chuquisaca municipio de Monteagudo,  vive en anticrético de un cuarto, él cuenta con la capacitación y estudios de la carrera Mecánica Automotriz  además de trabajos anteriores en talleres mecánicos, el señor Gary iniciara su propio actividad de taller mecánico y generara  sus ingresos para ayudar a mantener a su hija y así  mismo pueda hacerse conocer en el mercado de Monteagudo. Con el préstamo el señor Gary destinara para la compra  de herramientas de trabajo como ser llaves de tubo, gata scanner para vehículos y máquina de soldar y otros, por lo cual el podrá iniciar sus actividades brindando servicio de mecánica general y de esa manera generar  ingresos de su actividad y así  podrá tener mejores condiciones de vida y poder tener un mejor bienestar y diario vivir tanto para el como para su hija.
texts.en: Gary is a 27-year-old person who lives in Chuquisaca department, Monteagudo municipality. He lives in an anticretico agreement on a room. [In an “anticrético” arrangement, the owner leases property for a lump sum deposit instead of monthly rent. At the end of the lease period, the money is returned to the renter. If the owner fails to repay the money, the renter gets to keep the property.] He has training and education in the field of auto mechanics in addition to previous work in mechanic shops. Gary will begin his own mechanic shop and will generate income to help support his daughter and also to be able to be known in the market in Monteagudo. With the loan, Gary will purchase work tools such as tube wrenches, an auto scanner, and a soldering machine and more, with which he will begin his work offering general mechanic services and in this way will generate income from his work and, so, be able to have better living conditions and be able to have better well-being and daily living conditions for himself and for his daughter.

loans.use: to purchase work tools for auto mechanics to begin his work and in this way generate better living conditions for his daughter.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase refreshments, sugar, butter, soap, rice, pastas, cheese, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Sonan's Group

texts.en:
Sonan, who is 34, is a farmer living in Siem Reap province and she has two dependent children. For her living, she has grown rice on one hectare of farmland as the main source of her income for 16 years. She grows vegetables and catches fish to supplement her income. Her business earns her about 26,000 KHR per day and she is able to save 10,000 KHR each day after offsetting her family’s expenses. This year, she will earn less income than before because the crop is not healthy enough to produce good outputs.

Sonan has ever been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for four cycles already, and she repaid all loans successfully. The previous loans have enabled her to improve her living standard.

Sonan is now leading a group of two to get a new loan of 1,500,000 KHR and another member is seeking 1,200,000 KHR as well. As a group leader, she will use her loan portion to buy fertilizer, seed and fishing materials to support her business.

She hopes to support her business well so that she can update her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seed and fishing materials to support her business.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Prasat Bakong district

loans.name: Florescelda

texts.es:
Florescelda tiene 47 años de edad, conviviente con tres hijos dependientes, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos en el caserio las Juntas - Distrito de Pomahuaca, provincia de Jaén, Región Cajamarca, Sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza es la del comercio cuenta con una bodega la cual funciona en su domicilio en el caserio las juntas, además cuenta con una mototaxi con la cual brinda servicio de transporte, con mas de 20 años de experiencia en el rubro, presenta buenas referencias personales y laborales en su caserio. El préstamo lo utilizará en el negocio capital de trabajo y mercadería para aumentar stock, de esta amnera aumentara su volumen de ventas, y podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Florescelda is 47 years old, partnered, with three dependent children. She lives in her own house with her partner and their children in the village Las Juntas, Pomahuaca district, Jaén province, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Peru.

The work she does is in sales. She has a grocery store which she runs in her home in the village of Las Juntas. In addition, she has a motorcycle taxi with which she offers transportation services with more than 20 years of experience in the field. She has good personal and work references in her village. The loan will be used for working capital in merchandise to expand her stock. In this way, she will increase her sales volume and will be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to increase her grocery store's stock.

loans.name: Tamara

texts.en:
Tamara is 60 years old and she lives in Zovaber village of the Gegharkunik region. She has a higher pedagogical education and she started from a very young age (when she was 24 years old). She is actively engaged in different pedagogical programs.

Tamara lives with her husband, who is a driver, and together they also take care of their farm and cattle. Tamar spends most of the day at school and she mentions that she does her best to teach and to pass all the knowledge to her pupils connected with both of her subjects.

Now Tamar asks this loan of 700,000 Armenian drams (AMD) as she wants to buy a computer, accessories for it and also professional literature for her pedagogical activities.

loans.use: to buy a computer, accessories for it and also professional literature for her pedagogical activities.

loans.name: Las Trabajadoras Del Sector Los Lec Group

texts.es: (la que se ubica en medio de blusa rosada) Trabajadora, dedicada, amable y muy sincera son las características que la identifican en su comunidad, ella ha trabajado mucho para poder sostener a su familia, Alba cuenta que el contar con el apoyo de un crédito fue de gran beneficio para ella porque pudo realizar una inversión y surtir mejor sus productos de catálogo, y a Dios gracias le genero buena ganancias, sin embargo  Alba no está satisfecha con este logro por lo que junto a su grupo solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de más productos de catalogó y específicamente en la línea de cosméticos. Alba tiene el  anhelo de poder mejorar su negocio para incrementar su negocio.
texts.en: The member who is in the middle, in a pink blouse, is identified in her community as hard-working, dedicated, friendly and very sincere. She has worked a lot to be able to support her family. Alba says that having the support of a loan was a great benefit for her because she was able to make an investment and better stock her catalog products. And, thanks to God, it earned a good income. However, Alba is not satisfied with this achievement so, with her group, she is asking for another loan to purchase more catalog products, specifically, in the line of cosmetics. Alba has the desire to be able to improve her business to increase her business.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest it in cement, sand and gravel to cement to floor of the outdoor walkway in her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in groceries which she will use to prepare the food for the children and to sell the food on the weekends.

loans.name: Jai Vadjai Mata Mbg-C Group

texts.en:
Seeta Somnath, 30, standing to the extreme left in the photo, is a humble lady who hails from a small village of Maharashtra, India. She is a very hardworking lady and is engaged in poultry farming.

She has a three-year-old son and her husband owns a grocery shop. Seeta Somnath enjoys a contented life with her family with access to limited resources. Therefore, she was never able to build a toilet for her house which is her bare necessity.

Seeta Somnath, along with her other group members, is requesting a loan of 45,000 INR. She will use her portion of the loan to install a commode and shower and to incorporate steel water pipes in order to facilitate the water supply.

Seeta Somnath has a dream of opening her own restaurant and serving her customers, as cooking has always given her pleasure.

loans.use: to install a commode and shower and to incorporate steel water pipes in order to facilitate water supply.

loans.name: Andrez

texts.es:
Andrez es un productor de café de la zona norte de Nicaragua. Vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos en su pequeña finca de  1.4 hectáreas, de las cuales 1.05 son de café los cuales produce bajo los criterios de certificación Fairtrade. En los últimos años, este productor ha logrado una cosecha de aproximadamente 25 quintales de café pergamino.

Para este ciclo, se ha propuesto incrementar este rendimiento productivo y alcanzar una cosecha de al menos 35 quintales. Para esto, Andrez está solicitando un financiamiento que le permita la compra de insumos y fertilizantes, que contribuirán a asegurar la demanda nutricional de su plantación. 

Esta inversión se sumará al esfuerzo y trabajo que él y su familia vienen realizando en su finca para alcanzar mayores resultados y de esa forma mejorar su condición económica.
texts.en:
Andrez is a coffee producer in the north of Nicaragua. He lives with his wife and his three children on their small farm of 1.4 hectares, of which 1.05 are for coffee that produce an amount below the criteria for Fair-trade certification. In the last few years Andrez has produced a harvest of approximately 25 bushels of raw coffee.

For this cycle he has proposed to increase their productive output and to obtain a harvest that is at least 35 bushels. To do this, Andrez is seeking a loan that will allow him to purchase supplies and fertilizers that will contribute to, and secure, the nutritional demands of his plantation.

This investment will add to the efforts and hard work that he and his family are performing on his farm to achieve better results and thus improve their economic condition.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and fertilizers to apply to his coffee.

loans.name: Angelica Maria

texts.es: Angélica tiene 33 años de edad habita en casa familiar junto a su compañero de vida y sus cinco pequeños hijos de 14 años, 12 años, 10 años, 3 años, y la más pequeña de 6 meses de edad a los cuales a tres hijos les está dando estudios por ser los más mayores de edad, ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y se dedica a la compra y  venta de cocos, agua natural, jugos de frutas y sodas desde hace diez años por lo que le permite tener sus ingresos económicos y solventar en gran parte los gastos del hogar,  también el compañero de vida le aporta económicamente y juntos han logrado salir adelante. Angélica desea invertir en su negocio por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cocos, bolsas, pajillas, jugos, gaseosas, agua natural envasada y así  seguir aumentando sus ventas e incrementar sus ingresos que le ayuden a mejorar sus  condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en: Angélica is 33 years old, lives in the family house with her life partner and their five young children, ages 14, 12, 10, 3, and the littlest who is 6 months old, of whom they are providing an education for three because they are the oldest. She is a very hard-working woman and has worked buying and selling coconuts, natural water, fruit juices, and sodas for the past ten years. This allows her to have income and cover most of the household expenses. Her life partner also contributes economically and together they have managed to get ahead. Angélica wants to invest in her business so she asks FUSAI for a loan to purchase coconuts, bags, drinking straws, juices, soft drinks, bottled natural water, and in this way continue increasing her sales and her income, which helps her to improve her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to invest in coconuts, bags, drinking straws, juices, soft drinks, bottled natural water and in this way continue increasing her sales and her income.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Rodolfo tiene 47 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Rodolfo se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de piña, cuenta con una experiencia en el rubro de 10 años y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo que se le otorgará lo utilizará en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para realizar un adecuado mantenimiento de su cultivo de piña así como para la contratación de mano de obra para la época de cosecha. Con esto Rodolfo espera ofrecer una piña de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is 47 years old and lives with his spouse and children in their own house made of rustic material in Pucará district, which is located in Jaén province, Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in this district is peaceful and the people work primarily in agriculture, trade and raising animals.

Rodolfo works in agriculture, specifically in growing pineapple. He has 10 years of experience in this field and has very good personal and work references in the zone. The loan that will be granted to him will be used to purchase manure and fertilizers to care for his pineapple crop well and also to pay labor costs in the harvest season. With this, Rodolfo hopes to offer a better-quality pineapple to his customers which will have a positive impact on his income level, with the end of improving his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase manure and fertilizers to care for his pineapple crop well.

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es: Canderia es una emprendedora mujer que motivada por ayudar a su cónyuge con los gastos en el hogar, consideró que sus dotes en la cocina y su buena sazón, le permitirían iniciar su venta de comidas y que ésta sería una excelente oportunidad de negocio para ofrecerle a sus vecinos y conocidos; no lo dudó ni un instante y apostó que ésta idea de negocio sería todo un éxito.  Hoy en día, cuenta con dos años de preparar y comercializar almuerzos corrientes y sancochos, que diariamente sus clientes a partir de las 10 a.m. hasta las 4 p.m. pueden degustar; deliciosos platos típicos de la Región Caribe de excelente calidad a buenos precios.  Desde la comodidad de su hogar, ella continúa atendiendo sus labores sin ninguna dificultad y  su meta a futuro es mejorar la imagen de su negocio para captar más clientes, sin embargo, ella es consiente que solo podrá cumplir este propósito si continua comprometida y dedicada en su trabajo.  En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en víveres para la preparación de los almuerzos y sancochos. Con esta inversión accederá a fuentes de financiación que le ayudaran a capitalizar su negocio y mejorar sus ventas.  Ella es madre de siete hijos que en compañía de su cónyuge, educó y ofreció bienestar. Su prioridad es mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su cónyuge.
texts.en:
Canderia is an enterprising woman who was motivated to help her husband with the household expenses. She felt that her talents in the kitchen and her delicious food would allow her to start selling food, and that this would be an excellent business opportunity to sell to her neighbors and acquaintances. She did not doubt it for a minute, and she bet that her business would be a total success.

She has now been preparing food and selling lunch specials and stews for two years. She sells to her customers daily from 10:00 a.m. until 4:00 p.m. Her customers are able to savor delicious typical dishes from the Caribbean Region that are excellent quality for good prices.

From the comfort of her home she continues her work without any difficulties. Her goal for the future is to improve the image of her business in order to gain more customers. Nevertheless, she is aware that she will only be able to complete this plan if she continues to be committed and dedicated to her work.

She is currently applying for her first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the loan to buy food for the preparation of lunches and stews. With this investment she will access a source of financing that will help her to capitalize her business and improve her sales.

She has seven children. Together with her husband she educated them and provided for their well-being. Her priority is to improve her quality of life and that of her husband.

loans.use: to buy food to prepare lunches and stews.

loans.name: Alisa

texts.en:
Alisa is farmer from Haytagh village of Armavir region. She lives with her husband and is a mother of two children. She has only one piglet and most of her farming activities are with land, where she cultivates haricot, potato, tomato and greens.

Alisa's husband is responsible for selling the gathered harvest in local markets and earning income for their family's daily expenses. Alisa asks for this loan to purchase fertilizer, pesticides and to hire five people to help with cultivation works.

As this is Alisa's first loan, it has been approved within the framework of a joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The First-Chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products before because they have no credit history. Through this joint initiative, almost 600 borrowers like Alisa will get a chance to have their first loan and develop their businesses.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, pesticides and to hire five people to help with cultivation works.

loans.name: Arayik

texts.en:
Arayik lives with his wife and son in Sevan city of the Gegharkunik region.

All of his life, despite of being employed at different workshops, Arayik has never stopped farming. Now on his farm, he has cows, calves, bulls, sheep and chickens. Through the help of his wife, he sells his farm products to their regular customers. She sells milk, cheese, curd, meat and eggs.

Arayik also has a nice and colourful orchard, where he has apple, apricot, peach, plum, mulberry and fig trees. They sell the harvest at the city’s wholesale market to re-sellers mainly.

The loan of 700,000 Armenian drams (AMD) Arayik needs as he wants to buy a calf and also fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy a calf and also fodder for his farm cattle.

loans.name: Gulchehrahon

texts.ru: Гулчехрахон, 35 лет, есть 2 детей, она замужем. Образование у Гулчехрахон среднее, в качестве дохода для своей семьи, она занимается животноводством и полеводством. В хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, на 1,0 Га земли выращивает кукурузу. Ежемесячная прибыль - 25,800 сом (KGS). Гулчехрахон решила обратиться в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 коров для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и обучение ее детей.
texts.en:
Gulchehrahon is 35 and married with two children. She has a high school education and works in animal husbandry and agriculture as a source of income for her family. She has two cows on her farm as well as 1.0 hectares of land where she grows corn. Her monthly income is 25,800 KGS.

Gulchehrahon decided to approach Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 KGS to purchase three cows to increase her head count of livestock. She plans to put profits from the loan into further expanding her business and toward her children's education.

loans.use: to buy three cows in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Valerio

texts.es:
Valerio es un hombre de 27 años de edad feliz mente casado con una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 1 y 5 años, está linda  familia vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Valerio es  un padre de familia que ama y protege mucho a su familia, él trabaja de peluquero desde hace un año, pues gracias a este humilde trabajo ha logrado satisfacer las necesidades de su familia, gracias a la amabilidad con la que atiende a sus clientes mucha gente lo visita, y a raíz de esta necesidad Valerio a considerado necesario solicitar un préstamo para poder comprar más maquinaria y muebles para su peluquería y ofrecerle a sus clientes un mejor servicio.
Valerio tiene el anhelo de conseguir el crédito para realizar la inversión en su negocio e incrementar sus ingresos para mejorar su casa.
texts.en:
Valerio is 27 years old and happily married. He has a beautiful family comprising three sons aged between 1 and 5 years old. This lovely family live in a town in Sololá.

Valerio is a family man who loves and takes great care of his family. He has been working as a barber for a year and thanks to this humble job he has managed to meet the needs of his family. He is very attentive with his customers and hence many people now come to him. As a result Valerio has considered it necessary to ask for a loan to buy more equipment and furniture for his barbers shop. This will allow him to offer his customers an even better service.
Valerio is eager to get the loan so he can invest in his business, increase his income and improve his home.

loans.use: to buy furniture and equipment for his barber shop.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es una mujer de 35 años de edad, es muy trabajadora que todos los días se esmera para darle a su familia lo necesario, a pesar de vivir por el momento sola con sus hijos a logrado mantenerlos y darles lo necesario.
Margarita está profundamente  agradecida, porque con la ayuda del crédito pudo realizar la inversión en su tienda con el que logro una buena ganancia, ella ahora está muy satisfecha con este logro sin embargo no está conforme, por lo que esta solicitando un nuevo crédito y lo hace nuevamente en ADICLA porque es una de las pocas instituciones que apoya a la mujer emprendedora, el moto del crédito que Margarita solicita es de Q 10,000.00 para comprar productos de abarrotería como: recitos, jugos, aceite y arroz.
Margarita su mayor anhelo es construir su casa propia para que su familia viva mucho mejor.
texts.en:
Margarita is a 35-year-old woman, is very hard-working and every day she takes great pains to give her family what it needs. Despite living for the moment alone with her children, she has managed to support them and give them what they need.

Margarita is profoundly grateful because, with the help of the loan, she was able to make an investment in her store with which she got good earnings. She is now very satisfied with this achievement, however she is not settling for that, so she is asking for another loan and she is doing it again with ADICLA because it is one of the few institutions which support the entrepreneuring woman. Margarita is asking for a loan of Q10,000.00 to purchase grocery products such as chips, juices, oil and rice.

Margarita's greatest desire it to build her own home so that her family can live much better.

loans.use: to purchase grocery products such as chips, juices, oil and rice.

loans.name: Las Catalinas Group

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 31 años de edad, es feliz mente soltera tiene una linda familia de dos hijos de las edades entre 4 y 7  años, ellos viven en una comunidad de Sololá.
Maria (la primera del lado izquierdo) para sacar adelante a su familia se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica con el que ya tiene tres años de realizarlo, le gusta esta actividad porque lo realiza desde la comodidad de su hogar y le permite cuidar de sus hijos, para Maria lo más importante es mejor su negocio porque es su mayor fuente de ingresos y esto le permite mantener a su familia, es por ello que su entusiasmo por la superación la tiene como líder del grupo las Catalinas, y le crédito lo invertirá en la compra de hilos para elaborar ropa típica.
El gran sueño de Maria es poder mejorar su vivienda para que sus hijos vivan mejor.
texts.en:
Maria, age 31, is happily single. She has a lovely family with two children between the ages of four and seven. They live in a community in Sololá. Maria (the first one on the left) makes typical clothes in order to get her family ahead. She has been doing this for three years. She likes this business activity because she does it from the comfort of her home, and it allows her to care for her children.

The most important thing for Maria is to improve her business because it is her greatest source of income, and it allows her to support her family. That is why her enthusiasm for self-improvement makes her the leader of the Catalinas group. She will use the loan to buy thread to make typical clothes.

Maria's big dream is to be able to improve her house so that her children will live better.

loans.use: to buy thread to make typical clothing.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
Soledad continúa con su negocio de venta de comida. El crédito anterior lo invirtió en la compra de mesas, sillas y utensilios de cocina. El pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque su negocio no tuvo inconvenientes. Ella se especializa en comida tradicional como; majadito (carne deshidratada, arroz, huevo frito y plátano frito), locro (sopa de carne deshidratada, carne cortada en pedacitos, yuca y huevo), Chicharrón (Chanchitos de monte frito), y otros.
